text: Is there a HubL function for getting information on a contact list given its id?  It seems like `crm_object('list', <ID>)` is not a thing.

I asked this same thing a few months ago. It seemed consistent with the people I talked to that this isn't possible but should be. So I just ended up creating another solution using the list API (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/get_lists>). My solution was a complete hack but it works.
Are you able to make an API call using HubL?

No. The client had access to serverless functions so we created an endpoint to get the data we needed..... Actually I'm not sure what you are trying to do exactly but have you thought about using Smart Rules to show different content based on the list?
Using a dnd_area, is there no way to click and drag modules to adjust their order outside of the visual editor like with flex columns? If not this makes the templates pretty difficult to use.
